home.title: Developer Toolkit
home.subtitle: A collection of practical tools for developers and technical professionals
home.description: Including encryption/decryption, data conversion, code generation and other practical tools

token-generator.title: Token Generator
token-generator.description: Generate random strings using the characters you want, uppercase or lowercase letters, numbers and/or symbols.

hash-text.title: Hash Text
hash-text.description: Hash text strings using desired functions: MD5, SHA1, SHA256, SHA224, SHA512...

bcrypt.title: Bcrypt
bcrypt.description: Hash and compare text strings using bcrypt. Bcrypt is a password hashing function based on the Blowfish cipher.

uuids-generator.title: UUIDs Generator
uuids-generator.description: A Universally Unique Identifier (UUID) is a 128-bit number used to identify information in computer systems.

ulid-generator.title: ULID Generator
ulid-generator.description: Generate random Universally Unique Lexicographically Sortable Identifiers (ULID)

encrypt-decrypt-text.title: Encrypt/Decrypt Text
encrypt-decrypt-text.description: Encrypt and decrypt text plaintext using encryption algorithms (such as AES, TripleDES, Rabbit or RC4).

bip39-passphrase-generator.title: BIP39 Passphrase Generator
bip39-passphrase-generator.description: Generate BIP39 passphrases from existing or random mnemonics, or get mnemonics from passphrases.

hmac-generator.title: HMAC Generator
hmac-generator.description: Compute Hash-based Message Authentication Code (HMAC) using keys and hash-based hash algorithms.

rsa-key-pair-generator.title: RSA Key Pair Generator
rsa-key-pair-generator.description: Generate new random RSA private and public key pem certificates.

password-strength-analyzer.title: Password Strength Analyzer
password-strength-analyzer.description: Use this password strength analyzer and crack time estimation tool to discover password strength.

keycode-info.title: Keycode Info
keycode-info.description: Get javascript keycode and key information by pressing any key on the keyboard.

user-agent-parser.title: User Agent Parser
user-agent-parser.description: Parse and analyze user agent strings to extract browser, engine, OS, CPU and device information.

http-status-codes.title: HTTP Status Codes
http-status-codes.description: Complete list of HTTP status codes with their meanings and descriptions.

json-diff.title: JSON Diff
json-diff.description: Compare two JSON objects and get the differences between them.

base64-string-encode-decode.title: Base64 String Encode/Decode
base64-string-encode-decode.description: Encode and decode Base64 strings with support for both standard and URL-safe encoding.

base64-file-converter.title: Base64 File Converter
base64-file-converter.description: Convert files to Base64 encoded strings and decode Base64 strings back to files.

basic-auth-generator.title: Basic Auth Generator
basic-auth-generator.description: Generate HTTP Basic Authentication header from username and password.

case-converter.title: Case Converter
case-converter.description: Convert text between different cases: camelCase, PascalCase, snake_case, kebab-case, and more.

color-picker.title: Color Picker
color-picker.description: Pick colors and convert between different color formats: HEX, RGB, HSL, HSV.

date-time-converter.title: Date Time Converter
date-time-converter.description: Convert between different date and time formats, including Unix timestamps.

device-info.title: Device Info
device-info.description: Get information about your device, browser, screen resolution, and more.

html-entities.title: HTML Entities
html-entities.description: Encode and decode HTML entities to safely display special characters in HTML.

html-wysiwyg-editor.title: HTML WYSIWYG Editor
html-wysiwyg-editor.description: A rich text editor for creating and editing HTML content with a visual interface.

integer-base-converter.title: Integer Base Converter
integer-base-converter.description: Convert numbers between different bases: binary, octal, decimal, hexadecimal.

json-to-toml.title: JSON to TOML
json-to-toml.description: Convert JSON data to TOML (Tom's Obvious, Minimal Language) format.

json-to-xml.title: JSON to XML
json-to-xml.description: Convert JSON data to XML format with proper structure and formatting.

json-to-yaml.title: JSON to YAML
json-to-yaml.description: Convert JSON data to YAML format with proper indentation and structure.

jwt-parser.title: JWT Parser
jwt-parser.description: Parse and decode JSON Web Tokens (JWT) to view header, payload, and signature.

list-converter.title: List Converter
list-converter.description: Convert between different list formats: arrays, comma-separated, newline-separated.

markdown-to-html.title: Markdown to HTML
markdown-to-html.description: Convert Markdown text to HTML with support for syntax highlighting and formatting.

mime-types.title: MIME Types
mime-types.description: Lookup MIME types for file extensions and file extensions for MIME types.

open-graph-generator.title: Open Graph Generator
open-graph-generator.description: Generate Open Graph meta tags for better social media sharing and SEO.

otp-code-generator.title: OTP Code Generator
otp-code-generator.description: Generate Time-based One-Time Password (TOTP) codes for two-factor authentication.

roman-numeral-converter.title: Roman Numeral Converter
roman-numeral-converter.description: Convert between Arabic numbers and Roman numerals.

text-to-ascii-binary.title: Text to ASCII Binary
text-to-ascii-binary.description: Convert text to ASCII codes and binary representation.

text-to-nato-alphabet.title: Text to NATO Alphabet
text-to-nato-alphabet.description: Convert text to NATO phonetic alphabet for clear communication.

text-to-unicode.title: Text to Unicode
text-to-unicode.description: Convert text to Unicode code points and escape sequences.

toml-to-json.title: TOML to JSON
toml-to-json.description: Convert TOML (Tom's Obvious, Minimal Language) data to JSON format.

toml-to-yaml.title: TOML to YAML
toml-to-yaml.description: Convert TOML data to YAML format with proper structure.

url-encoder-decoder.title: URL Encoder/Decoder
url-encoder-decoder.description: Encode and decode URLs and URL components for safe transmission.

url-parser.title: URL Parser
url-parser.description: Parse URLs and extract components: protocol, host, path, query parameters.

xml-to-json.title: XML to JSON
xml-to-json.description: Convert XML data to JSON format with proper structure preservation.

yaml-to-json.title: YAML to JSON
yaml-to-json.description: Convert YAML data to JSON format with validation and error checking.

yaml-to-toml.title: YAML to TOML
yaml-to-toml.description: Convert YAML data to TOML format with proper syntax conversion.

qr-code-generator.title: QR Code Generator
qr-code-generator.description: Generate QR codes for text, URLs, and other data with customizable options.

wifi-qr-code-generator.title: WiFi QR Code Generator
wifi-qr-code-generator.description: Generate QR codes for WiFi network credentials for easy sharing.

svg-placeholder-generator.title: SVG Placeholder Generator
svg-placeholder-generator.description: Generate customizable SVG placeholder images with various sizes and colors.

camera-recorder.description: Record video and capture photos using your device's camera.

ulidGenerator.description: Generate random machine-readable universally unique lexicographically sortable identifiers (ULID).

passwordStrengthAnalyzer.description: Use this password strength analyzer and breach time estimation tool to check your password strength.

passwordStrengthAnalyzer.noteText: The computed strength is based on the time it would take to crack the password using a brute force approach, it does not take into account the possibility of a dictionary attack.
